pkgmetadata.longdescription: # osaisThe osais Python lib for connecting AIs to OSAIS cloud## Installpip install osais## Requirements Kept minimal (boto3, Jinja2, requests, schedule, watchdog, Werkzeug)AI that includes osais package must have a ./_input and a ./_output directory, for receiving and generating filesSupport of uploading to AWS S3 is provided## Supporteric [at] incubiq [dot] com
